The following 주문 설명 are presented in alphabetical order.

뇌 거미

Brain Spider

점술 [정신영향계]

레벨: 사제 8, Mind 7

구성요소: V, S, M, DF

시전 시간: 1 round

거리: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./레벨)

목표물: Up to eight living creatures

지속시간: 1 min./레벨

내성 굴림: Will negates

주문 저항: Yes

This spell allows you to eavesdrop as a standard action on the thoughts of up to eight other creatures at once, hearing as desired:

• Individual trains of thought in whatever order you desire.

• Information from all minds about one particular topic, thing, or being, one nugget of information per 시전자 레벨.

• A study of the thoughts and memories of one creature of the group in detail.

Once per round, if you do not 공연 a detailed study of one creature’s mind, you can attempt (as a standard action) to implant a 제안 in the mind of any one of the affected creatures. The creature can make another Will 내성 굴림 to resist the 제안, using the save DC of the 뇌 거미 spell. (Creatures with special 저항 to 부여술 주문 can use this 저항 to keep from being affected by the 제안.) Success on this 내성 굴림 does not negate the other effects of the 뇌 거미 spell for that creature.

You can affect all intelligent beings of your choice within 거리(up to the limit of eight), beginning with known or named beings. Language is not a barrier, and you need not personally know the beings The spell cannot reach those who make a successful Will save.

Material Component: A spider of any size or kind. It can be 죽음, but must still have all eight legs.

드웨머의 양도

Dweomer of Transference

강신술

레벨: 사제 4, 소서러/마법사 4

구성요소: V, S

시전 시간: 1 minute

거리: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 레벨)

목표물: One willing psionic creature

지속시간: 1 round/레벨

내성 굴림: Will negates (harmless)

주문 저항: Yes (harmless)

With this spell, you form a radiating corona around the head of a psionic ally, then convert some of your 주문 into psionic 파워 포인트. When you finish casting 드웨머의 양도, a red-orange glow surrounds the psionic creature’s head. For 지속시간 of the spell, any 주문 cast at the subject don’t have their usual effect, instead converting themselves harmlessly into psionic energy that the subject can use as energy for 사이오닉 파워. You can cast any spell you like at the subject, even 범위 주문, effect 주문, and 주문 for whom the subject would ordinarily not be a legitimate target. 주문 don’t do anything other than provide the subject with 파워 포인트, but you must still cast them normally, obeying the component and 거리 필요조건 listed in the 묘사 of each spell.

For each spell you cast into the 드웨머의 양도, the psionic creature gets temporary 파워 포인트, according to the following table. The transference isn’t perfectly efficient. The temporary 파워 포인트 acquired through a 드웨머의 양도 dissipate after 1 hour if they haven’t already been spent.

방언

Glossolalia

강신술 [Sonic, 정신영향계]

레벨: 음유시인 2

구성요소: V

시전 시간: 1 standard action

거리: 60 ft.

범위: Cone-shaped 폭발

지속시간: Instantaneous

내성 굴림: Fortitude partial; see text

주문 저항: Yes

You utter shrieks of nonsense and gibberish that thinking creatures find distracting and confusing. The spell affects only creatures with 지능 scores of 3 or higher. Any such creatures within the spell’s 범위 must succeed on Fortitude 내성 굴림 or be stunned for 1 round (if they have 지능 scores of 20 or higher), dazed for 1 round (if they have 지능 scores between 10 and 19), or shaken for 1 round (if they have 지능 scores between 3 and 9). In addition, a creature within the spell’s 범위 loses any 사이오닉 집중 it might have had and takes a –4 페널티 on 집중 checks for 1 round. These effects happen whether or not the creature succeeded on its save.

정신 절정

Mental Pinnacle

변환술

레벨: 소서러/마법사 6

구성요소: V, S, M

시전 시간: 1 standard action

거리: Personal

목표물: You

지속시간: 1 round/레벨

For a brief time, you achieve the mental dominance of a powerful 사이언, able to lash out at enemies using only the power of your mind. Your revel in your new mental powers to the point that you disdain using 주문, even in the form of effects from 마법 아이템. You gain a +4 enhancement 보너스 to 지능 and 지혜, 3 파워 포인트 per 시전자 레벨, and access to the following powers.

• 정신 추진A: Deal 1d10 피해.

• 자아 채찍A: Deal 1d4 Cha 피해 and 강타 for 1 round.

• 사이오닉 폭발A: Stun creatures in 30-ft. cone for 1 round.

• 이드 암시: Swift tendrils of thought disrupt and confuse your target.

• 사이킥 크러쉬A: Brutally crush subject’s mental essence, reducing subject to –1 히트 포인트.

You manifest the powers as a 사이언 of your 시전자 레벨 does, creating 표시 as described in each power’s 묘사. You lose your spellcasting ability, including your ability to use spell activation or spell completion 마법 아이템, just as if those 주문 were no longer on your class list. For 지속시간 of this spell, you use 마법 아이템 and 사이오닉 아이템 as if you were a 사이언 with only the five powers given above on your class list.

Any unspent 파워 포인트 dissipate when the spell ends.

Material Component: A potion of 여우의 교활함, which you drink (its effect is overridden by the effect of this spell).

생각 조사

Probe Thoughts

점술 [정신영향계]

레벨: Mind 6, Wiz/Sor 6

구성요소: V, S

시전 시간: 1 minute

거리: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 레벨)

목표물: One living creature

지속시간: 집중

주문 저항: Yes

All the subject’s memories and 지식 are accessible to you, ranging from memories deep below the surface to those still easily called to mind. You can learn the answer to one question per round, to the best of the subject’s 지식. You can also probe a sleeping subject, though the subject may make a Will save against the DC of the 생각 조사 spell to wake after each question. Subjects who do not 소원 to be probed can attempt to 이동 beyond the power’s 거리, unless somehow hindered. You pose the questions telepathically, and the answers to those questions are imparted directly to your mind. You and the target do not need to 말하기 the same language, though less intelligent creatures may yield up only appropriate visual images in answer to your questions.

사이킥 혼란

Psychic Turmoil

회피술

레벨: 사제 5, 소서러/마법사 5

구성요소: V, S, M

시전 시간: 1 standard action

거리: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 레벨)

범위: 40-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space

지속시간: 1 round/레벨

내성 굴림: Will partial; see text

주문 저항: Yes

With this spell, you create an invisible field that leeches away 파워 포인트 of psionic characters standing within the emanation. Nonpsionic characters are unaffected.

When the spell is cast and at the beginning of each of your subsequent turns, 사이오닉 생명체 within the 범위 of the 사이킥 혼란 lose 1 power point per 구현자 레벨 they have. Characters who succeed on a Will save when they first come into contact with the emanation lose only half as many 파워 포인트(round down) each round. Characters get only one save attempt against any particular 사이킥 혼란 effect, even if they leave the spell’s 범위 and later return.

Material Component: Five playing cards, which are torn in half when the spell is cast.

사이킥 혼란, 상급

Psychic Turmoil, Greater

회피술

레벨: 사제 7, 소서러/마법사 7

지속시간: 1 round/레벨

As 사이킥 혼란, except you gain 1 temporary hit point for each power point the spell takes from a psionic creature. 임시 히트 포인트 last for 1 hour.

텔레파시 결속, 하급

Telepathic Bond, Lesser

점술 [정신영향계]

레벨: 사제 3, Mind 3, 소서러/마법사 3

구성요소: V, S

시전 시간: 1 standard action

거리: 30 ft.

목표물: You and one willing creature within 30 ft.

지속시간: 10 min./레벨

내성 굴림: None

주문 저항: No

You forge a 텔레파시 결속 with another creature with an 지능 score of 6 or higher. The bond can be established only with a willing subject. You can communicate telepathically through the bond regardless of language. No special power or influence is established as a result of the bond. Once the bond is formed, it works over any distance (although not from one plane to another).
